rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with eco-friendly lighting, recycled wood paneling and a Vastu-aligned orientation to harness positive energy.
Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows on the south-eastern wall for natural light, enhanced ventilation and connectivity with the garden. Designed using sustainable materials.
Modern dining area adjacent to the living room, featuring eco-friendly fixtures and a Vastu-compliant layout for balanced energy flow.
Energy-efficient kitchen with solar-powered appliances and ample natural light from strategically placed openings. Adheres to Vastu guidelines by orienting the stove area in the south-east.
Compact bathroom designed for water conservation and energy efficiency, with eco-friendly fixtures and a Vastu-compliant layout.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling window enhancing natural lighting and ventilation.

rooms.description: Luxurious master bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows on the south-western wall for optimal light and Vastu compliance. Includes eco-friendly insulation.
Guest bedroom oriented in a favorable direction as per Vastu, featuring sustainable materials and natural ventilation.
Private bathroom for master suite with water-saving fixtures and eco-friendly design elements.
Fully-equipped private gym integrating eco-friendly equipment and energy-efficient LED lighting, aligned in a direction to balance Vastu principles.

openings.description: Balcony offering a view of the garden, designed to promote relaxation and natural ventilation.
